about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, SVS Ventures Limited is engaged in the real estate business. The entity undertakes construction and real estate development projects, focused primarily on the construction and development of residential and commercial projects.

SVS Ventures primarily operates in and around Ahmedabad, Gujarat. In 2021, the company entered into a business takeover agreement in April with Erstwhile Proprietary Firm M/s Vijay & Co. of Mr Shashikant Vedprakash Sharma.

The company's business model is customer-centric, and requires optimum utilization of our existing resources, assuring quality supply and achieving consequent economies of scale.

The business operations include the development of real estate projects in the residential segment comprising apartment-type complexes, and villas, largely catering to the middle-income and high-income groups.

The company's below mentioned projects are marketed and sold under the brand name of "SVS Ventures (formerly known as Vijay & co.)".

1) Residential Projects: These projects cover Bungalows and Villas.

2) Commercial Projects: These projects include the construction of commercial offices and shops.

SVS Ventures' financials reflect a positive financial standing in the market where its revenues and profits have grown vastly. As of March 2022, the company's total revenue stood at Rs. 868.27 lakhs with a profit of Rs. 183.37 lakhs.

faqs.question: What is the SVS Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer:
SVS Ventures IPO is a SME IPO of 5622000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹20 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on December 30, 2022, and closes on January 4, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in SVS Ventures IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in SVS Ventures IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in SVS Ventures IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in SVS Ventures IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'SVS Ventures IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When SVS Ventures IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The SVS Ventures IPO opens on December 30, 2022 and closes on January 4, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of SVS Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: SVS Ventures IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for SVS Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in SVS Ventures IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is SVS Ventures IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for SVS Ventures IPO will be done on Monday, January 9, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 11, 2023. Check the SVS Ventures IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is SVS Ventures IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The SVS Ventures IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 12, 2023.
